response.job_title: Project Specialist - Management QACC at Qatar Airways
response.summary: MECHANICAL ENGINEER, MSc. IN PROJECT MANAGEMENT and SPECIALIST IN MAINTENANCE MANAGEMENT with knowledge and international working and academic experience in project formulation and development, supplier management and contracting, tribology (lubrication), planning and execution of industrial maintenance, innovation and development mainly in the automotive, Oil and Gas, Industrial and Food sectors. Certified PMP, PMI-ACP, PMI-RMP, MPM. CIPM and SMC, my interest is focused in the execution and management of big projects and development of new businesses within industrial and aviation sectors, as well as total productive maintenance (TPM) and business productivity. Ability to adapt to different cultures and new processes, with high comprehensive business vision. High level domain of the Office software package as well as MAXIMO and SAP PM.
response.skills: AutoCAD, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Word, English, Engineering, Project Engineering, PowerPoint, Inventor, Planeamiento de proyectos, Gestión de proyectos, Industria petrolera, Ingeniería, Project Management, Project Planning, Business Strategy, Inglés, Petróleo y gas natural, Petroleum, Ingeniería de proyectos

profile_positions.description:
- Project Evaluator for 15 multisectoral business plans of the public bid # 73 (Government Orange Economy Program) financed by SENA – FONDO EMPRENDER.
- Development of project proposal, work scope and schedule requirements. Free Trade Zone – Cartagena, Colombia. SNIDER.
- Development of project management plans accoring to PMI, change and risk management, engineering, construction sequencing, standards specifications and project schedule for the vehicles work area expansion project. Vehiplus Ltda. Bogotá, Colombia
- Expert advisor for the construction and validation of exams to provide jobs within the National Defense Sector. Universidad Libre. Bogotá, Colombia.
profile_positions.title: Project Management Consultant

profile_positions.description:
- Participation in the maintenance professionals school for the LatinCentro region (LAC) - Tenjo Plant.
- Support engineer for the assembly and commissioning project of puff pastry production line - Tenjo 2 plant.
- Support to the maintenance projects area in cost control and execution of works. Tenjo plant.
- Maintenance Supervisor / Head of Mechanics for the area of machinery room, handling of materials and general services.
- Planning, programming and supervision of maintenance work on equipment in the assigned area.
- Personnel management. Training and training.
- Development and budget control.
- Supervision of routines, preventive maintenance and lubrication in equipment of the assigned area.
- Improvement of indicators in relation to previous years.
- Registration of information related to the operation of equipment and its faults for the development of improvements.
- Preparation of maintenance plans and verification of the existence of critical spare parts for essential equipment of the operation.
- Updating of records of assets in disuse of the plants of the LatinCentro region.
profile_positions.title: Maintenance Professional - Supervisor / LatinCentro.

profile_positions.description:
- Selection and management of suppliers under the compliance principle, in accordance with the guidelines of the HQ in Germany, preparation of comparative tables, negotiation and contracting.
- Analysis of business opportunities, support in the management and successful execution of contracts and projects in the water and industry sector:
o	Contract CT-2013-000946: "Purchase of valves for the operation of the primary networks of aqueduct". Contracting entity: Empresas Públicas de Medellín S.A. E.S.P. (COP 237.805,51)
o	Contract CT-2014-002711: "Purchase of electromechanical equipment and electric cells for the pumping of the San Nicolás Valley". Contracting entity: Empresas Públicas de Medellín S.A. E.S.P. (COP 4,589,993,209.55)
o	Contract CT-2016-001505: "Supply, assembly, commissioning and testing of electromechanical equipment for Robledo-Porvenir pump modernization". Contracting entity: Empresas Públicas de Medellín S.A. E.S.P. (USD 381,067 + COP 493,278,260)
o	Contract No. P0602015000720: "Purchase, transport to the installation site, assembly and start-up of an automated plant for the recycling of construction and demolition waste (RCD) or debris". Contracting entity: Recycled Granules of Colombia S.A.S - GRECO S.A.S (EUR 1,748,426.16 + COP 2,034,734,032.34)
- Information flow management with potential suppliers for the expansion of work and business networks.
- Preparation of comparative tables and negotiation focused on electromechanical equipment, (installation and start-up).
- Training in electromechanical equipment with different manufacturers in Germany (KSB, VAG, ERHARD, SIPOS).
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer - Special Projects Unit - Business development of the Engineering Department.

profile_positions.description:
- Development and implementation of the lubrication chart of the rotating equipment of the production facilities, for the execution of field maintenance routines as a complement to the preventive maintenance plan of the production equipment.
- Control and classification of spare parts for critical equipment for production facilities.
- Design and calculation of lifting tools for internal certification.
- Technical support in solving problems and repairs in the field.
- Preparation of performance reports of assets in the field as well as improvement plans in engineering and projects.
- Support in supervision of preventive and corrective maintenance tasks of the equipment of the production facilities.
profile_positions.title: Jr. Professional - Maintenance Business Unit. Oil Field Caricare Arauca.

profile_positions.description:
- Support in the 3-Series automobile design for the years 2011 and 2012.
- Planning and execution of technical tests on new components, developed in the respective phases of the process established by the company.
- Planning of different tests and pilot tests to be carried out in the electrical, acoustic, body and motor areas in various prototypes.
- Training in company internal software for the configuration of test prototypes and tests to be carried out.
- Verification of configuration of test vehicles in the workshop of the innovation and research center in Munich, used as the basis for the serial production of the model that was released in 2011 and 2012.
profile_positions.title: Jr. Professional - Integrated Security group practice. EG-733. Automobile Integral Development Area.

education.field_of_study: MSc. in Project Management - Degree with Merit

company.name: Qatar Airways
company.description:
Qatar Airways is the national airline of the State of Qatar. Based in Doha, the Airline’s trendsetting on-board product focuses on: comfort, fine cuisine, the latest in-flight audio & video entertainment, award-winning service and a modern aircraft fleet averaging around 5 years of age.

Awards by industry audit Skytrax:
- Airline of the Year (2011, 2012, 2015, 2017, 2019, 2021, 2022)
- World's Best Business Class (2013, 2014, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2021, 2022)
- Best Business Class Airline Lounge (2014, 2016, 2021)
- Best Airline in the Middle East (2014, 2015, 2017, 2018, 2021)
- Best Airline Staff in the Middle East (2016)
- Best Business Class Seat (2015, 2019, 2021)
- Best Business Class onboard Catering (2021)

Qatar Airways serves more than 160 key business and leisure destinations worldwide, with a fleet of over 200 aircraft. The airline flies to Australia, Asia, Europe, Middle East, Africa, North America, and South America.

Qatar Airways is looking for the very best candidates to help support the Airline's incredible growth. Visit http://bit.ly/QRvacancies to land a great career.

Please visit www.qatarairways.com/support if you require a response to a formal complaint.
